description: This file defines the XTools class, a specialized toolkit for interacting with Twitter via the Tweepy API. It includes methods for creating posts, replying, sending direct messages, fetching user info, retrieving timelines, and searching posts, all tailored for Twitter API operations.

classes.name: XTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for Twitter API interactions, extending the Toolkit base class, providing methods for posting, replying, messaging, and retrieving user and timeline data.

methods.name: create_post
methods.description: Creates a new tweet on Twitter with the specified text.

methods.name: reply_to_post
methods.description: Replies to an existing tweet identified by post_id with the provided text.

methods.name: send_dm
methods.description: Sends a direct message to a user specified by username or user ID.

methods.name: get_my_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about the authenticated user.

methods.name: get_user_info
methods.description: Fetches profile information for a specified username.

methods.name: get_home_timeline
methods.description: Retrieves recent tweets from the authenticated user's home timeline.

methods.name: search_posts
methods.description: Searches for recent tweets matching a query, optionally including post metrics.
